# tester

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of tester is to rovides functionality for my package.These function are for use only with Gustavo Bruges and no other people.

## Installation

You can install the released version of tester from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("tester")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(tester)
## basic example code
```
